content: solar system jupiter ___________________________________________________________________________________ crochet level advanced beginner/intermediate start with a magic_ring crochet terms us round 1 in magic_ring start with ch1 single_crochet ch1 counts as your first double_crochet this pattern is available in english only 15 double_crochet close with invisible join and cut yarn 16 double_crochet i made my square with sport yarn and crochet hook size round 2 with new color stand bpdc around any st ch1 bpdc 4 5 my square measures just over 5 around next st repeat around to last st ch1 slip_stitch in first double_crochet with worsted weight yarn and crochet hook size 5 or to close cut yarn 16 double_crochet 16 ch1 space 5 5mm your square should measure about 6 round 3 skip all double_crochet work only in chain space abbreviations with new color stand single_crochet in any chain space ch1 single_crochet in same chain space magic_ring - magic_ring * single_crochet ch1 single_crochet in next chain space* repeat from * to * around round - round close with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet and cut yarn 32 single_crochet 16 ch1 space space - space skip - skip round 4 skip all single_crochet work only in chain space stand - standing with new color stand popcorn in any ch1 space *ch3 mini popcorn in st - stitch next chain space ch3 single_crochet in next chain space ch3 mini popcorn in next chain space slip_stitch - slip_stitch ch3 popcorn in next chain space* repeat from * to * around omitting yo - yarn over the last popcorn close with a slip_stitch in top of first popcorn and cut yarn chain - chain 4 popcorn 8 mini popcorn 4 single_crochet 16 ch3 space single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet round 5 skip all mini popcorn double_crochet - double_crochet with new color stand single_crochet in chain space after any popcorn 2 single_crochet in same chain space *3 single_crochet in next chain space single_crochet in next single_crochet 3 single_crochet in next chain space twice fpsc around next popcorn 3 single_crochet in next chain space* repeat from special stitches * to * around omitting the last 3 single_crochet close with a slip_stitch in popcorn - make 4 double_crochet in same space remove hook and insert hook first single_crochet do not cut yarn 52 single_crochet 4 fpsc in top of first double_crochet grab loop and pull through mini popcorn - make 4 half_double_crochet in same space remove hook and round 6 ch2 *half_double_crochet in next 2 st single_crochet in next 7 st half_double_crochet in next 3 st insert it in top of first half_double_crochet grab loop and pull through double_crochet ch2 double_crochet in next st the fpsc half_double_crochet in next st* repeat bpdc - back post double_crochet insert hook from back to front from * to * around omitting the last half_double_crochet and close with around the post of indicated stitch invisible join cut yarn fpsc - front post single_crochet insert hook from front to back 2 double_crochet 6 half_double_crochet 7 single_crochet per side 1 corner ch2 space around
